text: A special camp to screen persons with cardiac problems will be conducted at the Outreach Centre of Jawaharlal Institute of Post-Graduate and Medical Education and Research (JIPMER) here from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. on January 8. In a release here on Wednesday, E. Vallavan, District Collector, said that a team of specialists in Cardiology and Cardio Thoracic from JIPMER, Puducherry, will screen the needy. The Collector appealed to the people of Karaikal and neighbouring areas to avail themselves of the opportunity.
title: JIPMER Outreach to hold special camp
